title: Organization
description: A grouping of people or organizations with a common purpose.(Based on HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

fhir:identifier.title: Identifier
fhir:identifier.description: Identifies this organization across multiple systems.

fhir:active.title: Active
fhir:active.description: Whether the organization's record is still in active use.

fhir:type.title: Type
fhir:type.description: The kind(s) of organization that this is.

fhir:name.title: Name
fhir:name.description: A name associated with the organization.

fhir:alias.title: Alias
fhir:alias.description: A list of alternate names that the organization is known as, or was known as in the past.

fhir:description.title: Description
fhir:description.description: Description of the organization, which helps provide additional general context on the organization to ensure that the correct organization is selected.

fhir:contact.title: Contact Details
fhir:contact.description: The contact details of communication devices available relevant to the specific Organization. This can include addresses, phone numbers, fax numbers, mobile numbers, email addresses and web sites.

fhir:partOf.title: Part Of Organization
fhir:partOf.description: The organization of which this organization forms a part.

xdm:endpoint.title: End Point
xdm:endpoint.description: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the organization.

fhir:qualification.title: Qualification
fhir:qualification.description: The official certifications, accreditations, training, designations and licenses that authorize and/or otherwise endorse the provision of care by the organization.

xdm:identifier.title: Identifier
xdm:identifier.description: An identifier for this qualification for the organization.

xdm:period.title: Period
xdm:period.description: Period during which the qualification is valid.

xdm:issuer.title: Issuer
xdm:issuer.description: Organization that regulates and issues the qualification.
